Package com.github.cjwizard

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CustomWizardComponent
    An interface to allow the CJWizardPage to extract values from custom (and other non-swing) components.
    PageFactory
    This inteface must be implemented by classes that provide pages for the Wizard.
    WizardController
    Interface that must be implemented by classes that want to control the process of the Wizard.
    WizardListener
    A simple interface to enable arbitrary code to act in response to wizard actions.
    WizardSettings
    This interface declare the minimum methods that all wizard settings classes must implement.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    APageFactory
    Class that let you implement a PageFactory more easily providing you a default implementations of not so necessary methods.
    FlatWizardSettings
    This settings can save pairs of key and values in a plain HashMap.
    StackWizardSettings
    This class implement a WizardSettings that store its pages in a stack and in a cache so you can commit the current page and it will be used when a new page with the same id is restored.
    WizardAdapter
    A convenience class for implemeting parts of the WizardListener interface.
    WizardContainer
    This is the primary "Wizard" class.
    WizardPage
    This class is the basic implementation of a WizardPage.
    WizardTest
    This demo class uses a JDialog to hold the wizard.
    WizardTest2
    This demo class uses a JDialog to hold the wizard.
